short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Know when your contact visits your website, follow up timely and sell more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SalesWings allows you to track your leads on your website, prioritise them with lead scoring, and identify their interests and needs.

The SalesWings Chrome extension is a powerful add-on to our customer journey tracking and lead profiling solution SalesWings, and tracks your leads via Gmail and the Pipedrive email client.

Furthermore, SalesWings provides inside sales teams with a real-time view on their most recently engaged leads in a handy side bar within any tab of your browser.
